channel.title: fatty acid biosynthesis on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in fatty acid biosynthesis on funPlantGenes

item.title: BnFAX6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaC05G0364600WE Gene Symbol: BnFAX6 Gene Name: Fatty Acid Export 6 Genome: ZS11 reference genome Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Fatty acid export protein BnFAX6 functions in lipid synthesis and axillary bud growth in Brassica napus.

item.title: BnWRI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnWRI1 Gene Name: AP2/EREBP transcription factor Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnWRI1 coordinates fatty acid biosynthesis and photosynthesis pathways during oil accumulation in rapeseed.

item.title: GhBZR3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A10G0312 Gene Symbol: GhBZR3 Gene Name: Genome: genome version is NBI v1.

item.title: GhSSI2-A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSSI2-A Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhSSI2 isoforms from the stearoyl acyl carrier protein fatty acid desaturase family regulate Verticillium wilt resistance.

item.title: GhSSI2-B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSSI2-B Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhSSI2 isoforms from the stearoyl acyl carrier protein fatty acid desaturase family regulate Verticillium wilt resistance.

item.title: GhSSI2-C
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSSI2-C Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhSSI2 isoforms from the stearoyl acyl carrier protein fatty acid desaturase family regulate Verticillium wilt resistance.

item.title: GhWIN2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A07G036100 Gene Symbol: GhWIN2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The cotton GhWIN2 gene activates the cuticle biosynthesis pathway and influences the salicylic and jasmonic acid biosynthesis pathways.

item.title: GmACP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.18g244300 Gene Symbol: GmACP Gene Name: acyl carrier protein Genome: Wm82.

item.title: GmGPDHp1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02G218700 Gene Symbol: GmGPDHp1 Gene Name: Glycerol-3-phosphate Dehydrogenase 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: These results reveal a key role for GmGPDHp1-mediated G3P metabolism in enhancing TAG synthesis and demonstrate a strategy to modify the FA compositions of soybean oils for improved nutrition and biofuel.

item.title: HvWIN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvWIN1 Gene Name: WAX INDUCER1 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: WAX INDUCER1 (HvWIN1) transcription factor regulates free fatty acid biosynthetic genes to reinforce cuticle to resist Fusarium head blight in barley spikelets.

item.title: PpNAC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.4G187100 Gene Symbol: PpNAC1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor PpNAC1 and DNA demethylase PpDML1 synergistically regulate peach fruit ripening.

item.title: StMYB144
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.Atl_v3.07_1G012240.1 Gene Symbol: StMYB144 Gene Name: myeloblastosis transcription factor 144 Genome: Annotation (v3) for the Phased Assembly of Atlantic Tetraploid Potato Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StMYB24, StMYB144, and StMYB168 positively regulate suberin biosynthesis at potato tuber wounds during healing.
